boardgame.name: Via Appia
boardgame.description: Game description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Via Appia, the most famous road of the Roman Empire, is under construction. Be a part of this historic event and finish the road that connects Rome and Brindisi. Prove your intuition in the quarry to get the best stones. Whoever builds the most valuable sections and reaches the different cities early will be victorious and the most famous builder in all of Rome._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Goal of the Game (from the Rules)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Rome needs a connection to Brundisium, and the players have been tasked with building the Via Appia in order to allow for fast travel between the two cities. To create the road, they_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;ll need to break off stone tiles in the quarry, then travel to Brundisium, laying out the tiles and creating the path that all will follow in the years ahead. This travel costs sesterces, but will bring crucial victory points and glory from Rome in return._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2014 Games Magazine Best New Family Game Winner

Episode 3: Expedition Northwest Passage, Robocop, BGGcon, and Skulls of the Shogun
Garrett_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Games 377 - Via Appia and Wizard_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Brew

Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

Queen Games (QNG61071F) Via Appia, the most famous road of the Roman Empire is under construction. Be a part of this historic event and finish the road that connects Rome and Brindisi. Prove your intuition in the quarry to get the best stones. Whoever builds the most valuable sections and reaches the different cities early will be victorious and the most famous builder in all of Rome.

Shipping is from the DC metro area. Also available for local pickup. This game is closer to like-new condition but has some minor signs of scuffing on box corners. Has a few extras thrown in like laminated player aids. Payment for the game is expected via Paypal within a week of the invoice being sent. Shipping costs are done according to what is cheapest for the buyer. Typically, this will be via USPS Priority Mail flat rate box which includes a tracking #. The shipping weight of this item is ~5 lbs.
